text: Finally, after the last guy turned your arm into a Jackson Pollock painting, a nurse appears with the words you’ve been dying to hear:
'Hi, I’m here to do an ultrasound-guided IV.'
You cry a little. She pretends not to notice. In seconds, it's in. Flawless. Like butter. She even tapes it gently, like you’re not already covered in failed pokes.

choices.text: 🛏️ Hope this means you're getting a bed now
🏠 Screw this, go home and suffer alone

resources.title: Tips for Securing Ultrasound IVs Early
items: Request early if you’ve needed it before
Ask for vascular access team, not random techs
